summary: Restaurant/service booking app with admin dashboard, table booking, payment details, and screenshot functionality.
architectural_notes: App includes an admin dashboard that should display table bookings
Payment details section is a required feature
known_issues: Table bookings submitted by users are not appearing in the admin dashboard

existing_features.title: Fix the admin dashboard so that table bookings submitted by users appear correctly. Ensure that after a user submits a booking via the Contact/booking page, it is retrievable and displayed in the Admin dashboard booking list without requiring a manual refresh or re-login.

Restore the payment details section in the booking form on the Contact page. The section should allow users to enter or view payment-related information (e.g., advance payment amount, payment method, UPI/bank details for the restaurant) as part of the table booking flow.

Add a screenshot/capture option in the booking confirmation flow. After a user successfully submits a booking, provide a button that allows them to take or download a screenshot of their booking confirmation details (booking ID, name, date, time, party size, payment info) as an image or printable view.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix table bookings not appearing in admin dashboard
Restore payment details section that was removed
